name: Burnt Out: Seven Sins
description:
You may be in (bullet) hell, but there is one way to escape. There's a catch though: if you get caught sinning, you'll be punished.

Made for the SGDA Fall 2021 Jam

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Shoot: X or spacebar

Continue Dialogue: Z or enter

Credits

Programming: Dakota Fisher, Cameron Kelly

Art: John Mai, Sakina Mehdi, Kavi Nambury, Cameron Kelly

UI: John Mai

Audio: Cameron Kelly

Narrative: John Mai, Sakina Mehdi, Kavi Nambury, Cameron Kelly, Dakota Fisher

Special thanks to Aliya, Fufu, Kem, and Scott
